title: ESP-40-Cancel Escort Booking Request Response Schema
description: Schema for EST response to a cancellation request. Processing the request is asynchronous so this response payload simply includes a EST generated receipt Id.

cancellationId.description: Unique Id for this cancellation - generated by RMP.

receiptId.description: A unique Id generated by the EST to identify receipt of this cancellation request. A v4 UUID should be used.
